name: library-fullstack
description: Full-stack Book Library application with AI-assisted development workflow

scripts.dev:backend: npm run kill:backend && cd backend && dotnet run --project src/LibraryApi
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: npm run kill:backend && cd backend && dotnet test
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.validate: npm run validate:backend && npm run validate:frontend
scripts.validate:backend: cd backend && dotnet build --configuration Release && dotnet test --configuration Release --no-build
scripts.validate:frontend: cd frontend && npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.update-client: npm run update-openapi && cd frontend && npm run update-client

author: AI-Assisted Development Team
